explanation: The error arises because 'MultiPtychoDataContainer' objects do not have a 'probe' attribute; instead, they have 'probes' and 'probe_indices'. In './ptycho/workflows/components.py', the code attempts to access 'train_container.probe', which leads to the AttributeError. To fix this, the code in 'components.py' needs to be updated to handle the new 'MultiPtychoDataContainer' structure. Additionally, other files such as './ptycho/loader.py', './ptycho/probe.py', './ptycho/train_pinn.py', './ptycho/model.py', './ptycho/raw_data.py', and './ptycho/tf_helper.py' may require modifications to properly support per-sample probes and the updated data containers.
